name: Bayes-Net-Structure-Prediction
body:
This Project explores the area of Structure Prediction, in particular, given a dataset , how to go about learning a Bayesian Network that encodes the different dependencies between the individual features.
This is a NP-Hard problem in the space of all possible Bayes Net Structures of a data, but using certain heuristics, it is possible come up with a tractable algorithm to predict the Bayes Net structure of a dataset.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
